data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Kachchh, Gujarat, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kachchh, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 23,016 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary: On average, 170 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kachchh, Gujarat, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, teach the young people in the county of Kachchh to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 2,092,400 citizens of the the county of Kachchh.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Hingora people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Hingora people.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Kachchh. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Kachchh, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the county of Kachchh, Gujarat, India has a population of 2,092,400.

We estimate Kachchh has 23,016 people who might know Jesus, 25,388 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,043,996 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kachchh, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Kachchh
location.people_groups_list: Sindhi Sama, Sonar Aksali, Koli, tribe, Royma, Bhadela
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sindhi Sama (1,100), Sonar Aksali (63,000), Koli, tribe (119,000), Royma (400), Bhadela (14,000)
